description: Test suite implementation for AppGateway components, including ResolutionStore, Resolver, and RequestRouter. Contains multiple unit tests that load overlays, verify overlays, test invalid paths, and check request routing functionality.

classes.name: ResolutionStore
classes.description: Class handling overlay of resolution data and querying for specific resolution entries.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Class responsible for loading overlay files and resolving target data based on application and device identifiers.

classes.name: RequestRouter
classes.description: Handles dispatching requests based on resolved routing information.

methods.name: int test_resolution_store_overlay()
methods.description: Tests the overlay mechanism in ResolutionStore to ensure last overlay overrides previous ones.

methods.name: int test_resolver_invalid_path()
methods.description: Tests that Resolver correctly reports failure when given a non-existent overlay path.

methods.name: int test_resolver_valid_overlay()
methods.description: Creates a temporary overlay JSON file, loads it into Resolver, and verifies correct resolution of an alias.

methods.name: int test_request_router_echo()
methods.description: Tests RequestRouter's DispatchResolved method to ensure it echoes resolution and parameters properly.
